text:
Q: Jane is celebrating the last day of Jan 2012. What is the date 24 hours later in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 11/10/2011
(B) 02/01/2016
(C) 01/04/2012
(D) 01/31/2012
(E) 02/01/2079
(F) 02/01/2012
Answer: F

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. Today is their golden wedding anniversary. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 03/05/2008
(B) 01/03/2008
(C) 01/31/2008
(D) 02/29/2008
(E) 01/04/2008
(F) 01/02/2008
Answer: B

Q: The concert was scheduled to be on 06/01/1943, but was delayed by one day to today. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 06/07/1943
(B) 06/02/1943
(C) 06/02/2013
(D) 07/25/1943
(E) 05/25/1943
(F) 06/02/1965
Answer: B

Q: May 6, 1992 is like yesterday to Jane, but that is actually ten years ago. What is the date a month ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 04/13/2002
(B) 04/06/2002
(C) 04/06/1975
(D) 09/06/2002
(E) 04/15/2002
(F) 04/05/2002
Answer: B

Q: The current local time is 3:02 pm of 5/4/2004. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 04/24/2023
(B) 04/10/2004
(C) 04/24/2004
(D) 04/25/2004
(E) 11/24/2003
(F) 05/15/2004
Answer: C

Q: Today is 9/7. Jane is watching NFL 2003. What is the date one week from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/14/1992
(B) 09/14/2011
(C) 09/05/2003
(D) 09/11/2003
(E) 09/14/2003
(F) 09/17/2003
Answer: E

Q: Yesterday was 12/31/1929. Today could not be 12/32/1929 because December has only 31 days. What is the date yesterday in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/03/1930
(B) 04/01/1930
(C) 01/10/1930
(D) 12/31/1838
(E) 12/31/1856
(F) 12/31/1929
Answer: F

Q: In the UK, people usually put the day before the month when formatting the date. Therefore, today is 02/01/1987 to them. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/30/1987
(B) 01/03/1987
(C) 01/05/1987
(D) 01/02/1987
(E) 12/29/1986
(F) 11/10/1986
Answer: D

Q: Today, 8/3/1997, is a day that we will never forget. What is the date one week ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/27/1997
(B) 07/27/1997
(C) 03/27/1998
(D) 09/02/1997
(E) 07/27/1973
(F) 06/29/1997
Answer: B

Q: May 6, 1992 is like yesterday to Jane, but that is actually ten years ago. What is the date one week from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 05/13/2044
(B) 06/10/2002
(C) 11/13/2001
(D) 03/13/2003
(E) 05/13/2002
Answer: E

Q: Jane booked a flight for tomorrow, Jul 29, 2002. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 07/16/2002
(B) 11/28/2002
(C) 09/11/2002
(D) 10/09/2002
(E) 08/18/2002
(F) 07/28/2002
Answer: F

Q: Today, 8/3/1997, is a day that we will never forget. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 08/04/2004
(B) 08/04/1901
(C) 08/07/1997
(D) 08/01/1997
(E) 08/04/1997
(F) 12/04/1996
Answer: E

Q: On May 9th, 2017 Jane bought 40 eggs. She ate one per day. Today she ran out of eggs. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 06/17/2017
(B) 07/16/2017
(C) 12/18/2016
(D) 06/18/2017
(E) 06/18/2016
(F) 06/18/2054
Answer: D

Q: In the US, Thanksgiving is on the fourth Thursday of November. Today is the US Thanksgiving of 2002. What is the date one week from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 11/15/2002
(B) 12/27/2002
(C) 11/29/2078
(D) 12/11/2002
(E) 11/30/2002
(F) 11/29/2002
Answer: F

Q: The concert was scheduled to be on 06/01/1943, but was delayed by one day to today. What is the date yesterday in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 05/24/1943
(B) 06/04/1943
(C) 06/01/1943
(D) 05/27/1943
(E) 03/20/1943
(F) 06/01/2005
Answer: C

Q: In the US, Thanksgiving is on the fourth Thursday of November. Today is the US Thanksgiving of 2001. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 11/19/2001
(B) 11/13/2001
(C) 11/12/2001
(D) 08/18/2001
(E) 11/12/2099
(F) 11/26/2001
Answer: C

Q: The first day of 2019 is a Tuesday, and today is the first Monday of 2019. What is the date a month ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/07/2018
(B) 11/30/2018
(C) 09/06/2018
(D) 12/08/2018
(E) 12/07/2075
Answer: A

Q: Today is 9/7. Jane is watching NFL 2003. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 08/29/2003
(B) 08/28/2043
(C) 06/14/2003
(D) 03/28/2003
(E) 08/28/1959
(F) 08/28/2003
Answer: F

Q: Jane got her job in 2016. Today is her 3-year work anniversary. She still remember that on Dec 2, her second day at work, she spilled coffee on her laptop. What is the date one week ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 11/23/2019
(B) 03/24/2019
(C) 02/29/2020
(D) 11/24/2019
(E) 06/24/2019
Answer: D

Q: Today is Sep 9, 1909. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/09/1886
(B) 09/09/1909
(C) 09/30/1909
(D) 09/09/1939
(E) 12/11/1909
(F) 11/19/1909
Answer: B
